title: Paying for Post-Secondary Education
description: This chapter examines various options for financing post-secondary education, including scholarships, grants, loans, and work-study programs.
learning_objectives: Compare various financing options for post-secondary education
Evaluate the costs and benefits of different educational paths
Understand the process of applying for financial aid
Analyze the long-term impacts of student loans
Develop a personalized education financing strategy

skill_builder.title: FAFSA Worksheet Skill Builder
skill_builder.description: A guided simulation to help students understand and practice completing the Free Application for Federal Student Aid.
